page.title: 13THE TOWN CENTRE
page.content: From our questionnaire about shopping habits,it would seem people don't like the idea of pedestrianisation because many come in cars and they want to be able to park anywhere.Under cover shopping may confuse old people who may get lost in the big shops and the owners would lose profits because they would go to the corner shops instead. Under this area of town lies Roman Castleford which was called Legeolium. The Romans built their forts in Castleford because it was the easiest place to cross the River Aire.The archeologists found granaries workshops and barrack blocks here. The Romans played draughts with flat stones in the Roman baths which are now covered to protect them.It is hoped one day to build a museum over the baths.
